news_subscription_des1:
By clicking “Subscribe”, you consent to receive messages (e-mails, SMS and push messages) from Libratone A/S with special offers, promotions, and news about our products and services. We expect to contact you approximately 1-2 times a month. 

You can always withdraw your consent by clicking the “Unsubscribe” link in the messages you receive.
news_subscription_des2: Read more about our processing of your personal data
